Package net.sourceforge.pbeans

Contains class Store, the main point of interaction with persistent storage.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Persistent JavaBeans tagged with this interface can be used with Store.
StoreInfo For any class Clazz that implements Persistent, you may define Clazz_StoreInfo which implements this interface.
 

Class Summary
AbstractStoreInfo Abstract implementation of StoreInfo.
Index Represents a database index.
PersistentMap A persistent map of strings to Persistent objects.
Store This is the main point of interaction with persistent storage.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateEntryException Thrown when a database record cannot be inserted because there's already an entry with equal unique-index values or primary keys.
StoreException  
 

Package net.sourceforge.pbeans Description

Contains class Store, the main point of interaction with persistent storage.
